forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 45. West southwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 54, with temperatures falling to around 51 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
In the stillness of the early morning, Downtown San Francisco greets the day under a shroud of mostly cloudy skies, with a whisper of coolness in the air. The temperature lingers in the mid-forties, hinting at the lingering touch of winter’s breath. As the sun starts to stretch its golden rays, rays of light will break through this cloud cover, transforming into a partly sunny afternoon, though temperatures will drift back down to the low fifties, showcasing the city’s unique charm. A gentle breeze from the west-southwest offers a soft, refreshing caress, perfect for a quiet wander through the concrete canyons.

The marine layer may still cradle the Golden Gate, leaving hints of fog that dance around the iconic bridge, while the city itself remains mostly clear, though perhaps a bit muted in color. This presents an opportunity to enjoy a leisurely stroll, perhaps along the waterfront or through one of the many parks. Dressing in layers will provide comfort against the coolness of the morning and the mildness of the day; a light jacket would pair well with a cozy scarf. Coffee in hand, one might find solace in observing the waking city, a canvas painted with clouds, occasional glimpses of sun, and the promise of a calm, reflective day.
